items.summary: Add a new, visually distinct button labeled "‚öôÔ∏è Settings" to the Admin Dashboard main action area (the same grid/list area where the existing admin actions like "Job Posts" and "üì¢ Manage Quiz" are accessed). The button must use a grey/black styling so it is clearly different from the other admin action buttons.

Implement a Settings modal (popup) in the Admin Dashboard that opens when the "‚öôÔ∏è Settings" button is clicked. The modal must contain a simple form with: (1) a labeled password input field with label text "Gemini API Key" (input type=password so the value is hidden), and (2) a button labeled "Save Settings".

When the user clicks "Save Settings" in the Admin Dashboard Settings modal, store the entered API key value (trimmed) in browser Local Storage under the key "gemini_api_key". After saving, show a success message exactly: "API Key Saved Successfully! ‚úÖ".
